answers.answer:
Refugees from Ukraine are eligible for a wide range of medical assistance, including basic healthcare services from a family doctor, specialist consultations, laboratory tests, hospitalization, dentistry, medical recovery, and services for specific conditions like Covid-19, pregnancy, and reproductive health.

To find detailed information, please visit the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and explore the various sections such as 'Family doctor and a basic package of services', 'Specialist consultation', 'Hospitalization services in public and private institutions', 'Dentistry in Romania', and others.
answers.bResponse:

For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees

answers.answer:
Medical recovery and rehabilitation services are offered as physical medicine and rehabilitation services provided on an outpatient basis in health resorts, and also include medical recovery treatment in hospitals and sanatoriums.

To find detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read under the sections titled "Medical recovery, physical medicine and rehabilitation services" and "Medical recovery in hospitals, sanatorium".

answers.answer:
Medical services provided for pregnant women include primary care, observation of the normal course of pregnancy, and supervision of high-risk pregnancies.

To find more detailed information, please visit the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and look for the section titled "Medical services for pregnant women".

answers.answer:
At a Women's Center, support services include assistance with reproductive health services like contraception, breastfeeding, prevention of sexually transmitted diseases, pregnancy monitoring, and abortions. They also offer services intended for victims of domestic violence.

To find detailed information, please visit the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and look under the section titled "Get help at a Women's center."
